name: CHRISMAS EVENT! Santa quest hangout with spinny santa
name_original: CHRISMAS EVENT! Santa quest hangout with spinny santa
description:
Congradulations looks like you've had a very very rare opportunity for a sneak peak for the chrismas event! press C to open right present press B to open left present press i for infnity gauntlet press 6 to summon demon press 1 to become drunk... the will be more endings to be added but you can also hangout clcik where you want to go then press a or space.

Made this thing when I was a kid i was so proud of it now it looks like an ms paint game
